data.trans_hint: Tôi chỉ có một quả táo, tôi không muốn chia sẻ.
data.en_hint: I have only one apple, I don't want to share.
data.content_game_1: I have only one apple, I don't want to share.
data.answer_en_hint: I have only one apple, I don't want to share.

data.trans_hint: Có hai cái bút trên bàn, cậu có thể lấy một cái, tôi lấy một cái.
data.en_hint: There are two pens on the table, you can take one, and I take one.
data.content_game_1: There are two pens on the table, you can take one, and I take one.
data.answer_en_hint: There are two pens on the table, you can take one, and I take one.

data.trans_hint: Có ba cuốn sách trong cặp sách của tôi, tôi có 5 nhưng đã cho Ben mượn 2.
data.en_hint: There are three books in my schoolbag, I have 5 but lent 2 to Ben.
data.content_game_1: There are three books in my schoolbag, I have 5 but lent 2 to Ben.
data.answer_en_hint: There are three books in my schoolbag, I have 5 but lent 2 to Ben.

data.trans_hint: Có bốn thành viên trong gia đình tôi, bố mẹ tôi, tôi và em gái.
data.en_hint: There are four members in my family, my parents, me and my sister.
data.content_game_1: There are four members in my family, my parents, me and my sister.
data.answer_en_hint: There are four members in my family, my parents, me and my sister.

data.trans_hint: Năm người đang chờ đợi tại trạm xe buýt, tôi có thể đếm số người bằng số ngón tay trên một bàn tay.
data.en_hint: Five people are waiting at the bus station, I can count the number of people with all fingers of a hand.
data.content_game_1: five people are waiting at the bus station, I can count the number of people with all fingers of a hand.
data.answer_en_hint: five people are waiting at the bus station, I can count the number of people with all fingers of a hand.

data.content_game_1: six and three is nine.
data.answer_en_hint: six and three is nine.

data.trans_hint: Mẹ tôi mua bảy cái bút chì màu khác nhau cho chúng tôi vẽ cầu vồng.
data.en_hint: My mother bought seven different color pencils for us to draw a rainbow.
data.content_game_1: My mother bought seven different color pencils for us to draw a rainbow.
data.answer_en_hint: My mother bought seven different color pencils for us to draw a rainbow.

data.trans_hint: Có tám chai nước còn trong tủ lạnh (có tổng 10 nhưng ai đó đã lấy mất 2)
data.en_hint: There are eight bottles of water left in the fridge. (There were 10 in total but someone took 2)
data.content_game_1: There are eight bottles of water left in the fridge. (There were 10 in total but someone took 2)
data.answer_en_hint: There are eight bottles of water left in the fridge. (There were 10 in total but someone took 2)

data.trans_hint: Tôi nhận được chín lá thư trong tháng này, thêm một là tròn mười.
data.en_hint: I received nine letters this month, one more to be ten.
data.content_game_1: I received nine letters this month, one more to be ten.
data.answer_en_hint: I received nine letters this month, one more to be ten.

data.trans_hint: Mười sinh viên đang học trong lớp, giáo viên chia họ thành 2 nhóm gồm 5 người.
data.en_hint: Ten students are studying in the class, the teacher splits them into 2 groups of five.
data.content_game_1: ten students are studying in the class, the teacher splits them into 2 groups of five.
data.answer_en_hint: ten students are studying in the class, the teacher splits them into 2 groups of five.

data.trans_hint: Có một trăm sinh viên tham gia buổi học ngày hôm nay, chúng ta dự kiến có 102 bạn, nhưng có vẻ 2 bạn đã bỏ.
data.en_hint: There are one hundred students attending the lecture today, we are expecting 102, but maybe 2 of them have quitted.
data.content_game_1: There are one hundred students attending the lecture today, we are expecting 102, but maybe 2 of them have quitted.
data.answer_en_hint: There are one hundred students attending the lecture today, we are expecting 102, but maybe 2 of them have quitted.

data.trans_hint: Họ kì vọng một nghìn quyển sách sẽ được bán trong ngày đầu tiên, như vậy là nhiều gấp đôi số ghi chép cuối của anh ta là 500 cuốn.
data.en_hint: They expect one thousand books will be sold in the first day, which would be double of his last five-hundred record.
data.content_game_1: They expect one thousand books will be sold in the first day, which would be double of his last five-hundred record.
data.answer_en_hint: They expect one thousand books will be sold in the first day, which would be double of his last five-hundred record.

data.trans_hint: Anh ta có một tỷ đô-la trong tài khoản ngân hàng, đủ để anh ta trở thành một tỷ phú.
data.en_hint: He has one billion dollars in his bank account, enough to make him a billionaire.
data.content_game_1: He has one billion dollars in his bank account, enough to make him a billionaire.
data.answer_en_hint: He has one billion dollars in his bank account, enough to make him a billionaire.

data.trans_hint: Một nghìn tỉ là số có 12 số 0 sau số 1.
data.en_hint: One trillion is a number with 12 zero after 1.
data.content_game_1: one trillion is a number with 12 zero after 1.
data.answer_en_hint: one trillion is a number with 12 zero after 1.
